form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION, G-325A

full_text: Screened by NARA 8/4/2023 U.S. Department of "Justice FORM G-325A OMB No. 1115-0066 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION Approval expires 4-30-85 (Family name) LAZARRE Sidrac E (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE (Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY FILE NUMBER FEMALE 9-3-1907 HAITIAN A- ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. PORT-DE-PAIX HAiTi (If any) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH (If known) CITY AND COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE LAZARRE Paul FATHER MOTHER (Maiden name) GENESIA ALEZI Port-de-Paix HAiTI HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) WIFE PiERRE PHiLIPPE A Amaranthe DIED FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES (if none, so state) FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE & PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR Ruelle Vallieves 939 Poil de Pain HAITI 1907 PRESENT TIME APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR Ruelle Valliores APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATION (SPECIFY) MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR N/A PRESENT TIME Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE NATURALIZATION STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT OTHER (SPECIFY): IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET/IS IN OTHER THAN ROMAN LETTERS, WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IN THIS SPACE: Hazarie Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT. APPLICANT: BE SURE TO PUT YOUR NAME AND ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN THE BOX OUTLINED BY HEAVY BORDER BELOW. COMPLETE THIS BOX (Family name) (Given name) (Middle name) A0433762 (Alien registration number) cangere SidRac (OTHER AGENCY USE) INS USE (Office of Origin) OFFICE CODE: TYPE OF CASE: DATE: Form G-325 A (Rev. 10-1-82) (3) C.
